description: Enable EO Malaysia members to find trusted recommendations within 30 seconds through quick search and filtering, eliminating the need to wait 24 hours for chat responses.

userStories.title: Add search bar to recommendations page
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to search recommendations by keyword so I can quickly find what I need without scrolling through all listings.
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar prominently displayed at top of /recommend page
Search filters recommendations by name, description, and category name
Search is case-insensitive
Results update as user types (debounced 300ms)
Show 'No results found' message when search has no matches
Clear button (X) to reset search
Typecheck passes: npm run build
userStories.notes: This is the core feature - members need to search 'lawyer' or 'pest control' and instantly see results

userStories.title: Add category filter dropdown
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to filter recommendations by category so I can narrow down to relevant business types.
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown showing all categories with recommendation counts
Filter works in combination with search
URL updates with filter params (?category=legal-services)
Selected category is visually highlighted
Option to clear filter and show all
Typecheck passes: npm run build
userStories.notes: Categories already exist in database, just need UI filter

userStories.title: Add rating filter
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to filter by minimum rating so I can see only highly-rated recommendations.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter options: All ratings, 4+ stars, 3+ stars
Works in combination with search and category filter
Shows count of matching results
URL updates with rating param (?minRating=4)
Typecheck passes: npm run build

userStories.title: Add sort options
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to sort recommendations so I can see the most relevant ones first.
acceptanceCriteria: Sort options: Highest rated, Most reviewed, Newest, A-Z
Default sort is 'Highest rated'
Sort persists in URL param (?sort=rating)
Sort dropdown styled consistently with other filters
Typecheck passes: npm run build

userStories.title: Add quick-action buttons to recommendation cards
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to call or visit a business website directly from the card so I can act immediately without opening the detail page.
acceptanceCriteria: Phone icon button that opens tel: link (if contact_info contains phone)
Globe icon button that opens website in new tab (if website_url exists)
Buttons appear on hover (desktop) or always visible (mobile)
Buttons don't interfere with card click to detail page
Typecheck passes: npm run build
userStories.notes: Extract phone number from contact_info field using regex

userStories.title: Show result count and search summary
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to see how many results match my search so I know if I need to refine my criteria.
acceptanceCriteria: Display 'Showing X recommendations' or 'Showing X of Y recommendations' when filtered
When searching, show 'X results for [search term]'
Message updates dynamically as filters change
Typecheck passes: npm run build

userStories.title: Add recommendations quick-access to homepage
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to access recommendations from the homepage so I don't have to navigate through menus.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Find Trusted Resources' section on homepage below hero
Show search bar that redirects to /recommend with search query
Display 3-4 top-rated recommendations as preview cards
'View All Recommendations' button links to /recommend
Typecheck passes: npm run build

userStories.title: Add popular categories quick links
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want to quickly jump to popular categories so I can browse common needs.
acceptanceCriteria: Display clickable category pills/badges above the grid
Show top 8 categories that have the most recommendations
Clicking a category applies that filter
Active category is visually highlighted
Typecheck passes: npm run build
userStories.notes: Could use teal badges similar to the card headers

userStories.title: Improve mobile search experience
userStories.description: As an EO member on mobile, I want the search and filters to be easy to use on a small screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar is full-width on mobile
Filters collapse into a 'Filters' button that opens a bottom sheet or modal
Filter selections show as pills below search bar
Touch targets are at least 44px
Typecheck passes: npm run build
userStories.notes: Most EO members will access on mobile

userStories.title: Add empty state with suggestions
userStories.description: As an EO member, I want helpful suggestions when no results are found so I can try alternative searches.
acceptanceCriteria: Friendly message when no results match filters
Suggest clearing filters or trying different search terms
Show 'Browse all categories' link
Display a few popular recommendations as alternatives
Typecheck passes: npm run build
